body:
Can you post what system your running on: CPU and Memory? I assume you are using binaries from http://bitcoin.org/bin/?
Maybe try to start bitcoin-qt while having the "Activity Monitor" open and check your memory consumption?
@codebox Could you check if there is some helpful information in the `debug.log` found in `~/Library/Application Support/Bitcoin/` (or wherever you chose the data directory to be) ?

The debug.log file is updated, but nothing stands out as an obviously related error:

2015-09-14 13:43:13 Bitcoin version v0.11.0 (2015-07-10 19:23:55 +0200)
